Xelahot.description: Features mastersplit (hold to split multiple times), zoom, and fast feed.

Ctrl.description: Various UI options (e.g. claassic to burst, hide party icons).

Flex.description: Press 3 fingers to open the debug tool. See https://github.com/FLEXTool/FLEX for a full list of its capabilities.

Shark.description: Multiple macro buttons, auto classic macro, minimap, change game speed, and more.

Kahraba.description: This is a cracked version of Kahraba's mod (courtesy of Shark). It includes a new settings page with switch classic and burst buttons, macro, zoom buttons, mastersplit, and instantly claim mission rewards, and more.

Kahraba2.description: Version 2 of Kahraba's mod, with various differences in UI and capability. It is not cracked, so you will need a license. Instagram: https://instagram.com/8tf_l

QxAnarky.description: QxAnarky's UI mod, with zoom buttons, switch classic and burst buttons, mastersplit (hold emoji button to toggle), and more.

Bite.description: Contains various functions that integrate with Bite's website, https://biteyt.com/biteyt-shop, mostly getting keys to upload skins / buy skins / glitches on his website.

Amarillo.descrition: Adds various shortcuts to skin editor, settings, and region selector. Helps if QxAnarky's mod breaks the skin selector.
